product_metadata.plan_type: Non-Linked, Non-Participating, Individual Life Insurance Term Plan

product_summary.objective: Bajaj Life eTouch II is a protection-focused term plan designed to safeguard the policyholder and family against uncertainties like death, terminal illness, and accidents with flexible payout options.
key_advantages: Choice of variants (Life Shield, Life Shield Plus, Life Shield ROP)
Option for Return of Premiums (ROP variant)
Extra payout in accidental death (Plus variant)
Flexible death benefit payout: lump sum or monthly income
Auto Cover Continuance Benefit (premium deferral up to 12 months)
Early Exit Value option after long-term continuation
Tax benefits as per prevailing laws

core_benefits.details: Nominee receives Sum Assured on Death. Option available for lump sum, monthly income (5–40 years), or combination.
Accelerated death benefit. If Sum Assured > ₹2 Cr, ₹2 Cr is paid and remaining cover continues with premium waiver.

core_benefits.benefit_name: Accidental Death Benefit (Life Shield Plus only)
core_benefits.details: Additional payout equal to ADB Sum Assured if death occurs due to accident.
If Life Assured survives till maturity with no prior claims, Total Premiums Paid is returned as lump sum or instalments.
Future premiums are waived and coverage continues.

early_exit_value.availability: Life Shield & Life Shield Plus only
early_exit_value.condition: Can be exercised after 25 policy years and minimum age 60
early_exit_value.benefit: Return of Total Premiums Paid (subject to rules)

premium_holiday.conditions: First holiday allowed after 5 policy years

auto_cover_continuance.benefit: Premium deferral up to 12 months with full cover continuation

riders.rider_name: Bajaj Life New Critical Illness Benefit Rider
Bajaj Accidental Permanent Total/Partial Disability Rider

sample_illustrations.name: Ravi
sample_illustrations.scenario: Death at age 50 → nominee receives ₹1 Crore lump sum

sample_illustrations.name: Rajesh
sample_illustrations.scenario: Accidental death → nominee receives total ₹2 Crores

must_disclose: Insurance is subject to terms and conditions.
Please read the sales brochure and policy document carefully before purchase.
compliance_rules.fraud_warning: BEWARE of spurious phone calls and fraudulent offers. IRDAI does not sell policies or announce bonuses.
compliance_rules.tax_disclaimer: Tax benefits are subject to provisions of Income Tax Act and amendments. Consult your tax advisor.

retrieval_chunks.text: Nominee receives Sum Assured on Death, payable as lump sum or monthly instalments for 5–40 years.
Terminal Illness Benefit pays up to ₹2 Crores. If Sum Assured exceeds ₹2 Cr, remaining cover continues with premium waiver.
eTouch II offers Life Shield, Life Shield Plus (with Accidental Death Benefit), and Life Shield ROP (Return of Premium).
Premium Holiday allows skipping premiums for 1–3 years while keeping policy benefits active.
Early Exit Value allows policyholder to exit after 25 policy years and get Total Premiums Paid back, subject to conditions.
